Pokemon - Class in DataStuctures
 
Pokemon(String, HashMap<String, Type>) - Constructor for class DataStuctures.Pokemon
Description: Creates a Pokemon object using it's name and looking up and reading the needed information from various spreadsheets using it's name as a reference Pre condition: name must not be null, the name must be a valid Pokemon name in the list/spreadsheet, the typeMap must not be null Post condition: a Pokemon object is created and it's stats and other values calculated and it is now ready to be used
Pokemon(Pokemon) - Constructor for class DataStuctures.Pokemon
Description: A base constructor that takes in a Pokemon object and creates a new Pokemon object with all the properties pre condition: base must not be null and all of it's instance variables must be defined post condition: A new Pokemon object is created
pokemonSelect(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean) - Static method in class Graphics.Game
; Description: If the user selected a preset team, their team will be automatically decidedIf the user opts for a custom team, they will be prompted in the console to enter their own Pokemon, and continue to do so until 6 valid Pokemon have been entered.
pokemonSwap() - Static method in class Graphics.Game
Description: USed to create a JFrame beside the battle screen when the user opts to swap Pokemon or their current one faints.
pp - Variable in class DataStuctures.Move
 
preset() - Static method in class Graphics.Game
Description: allows the user to select their team.
